name: The Only One 4 You
description:
❤️

Here at The Only One 4 You, we pride ourselves on being able to find anyone's soulmate.

Our revolutionary AI can find any person's soulmate with almost pinpoint accuracy. However, the AI isn't perfect... yet.

We're looking for individuals to help train our AI. As a trainer, you will receive 5 possible soulmates, and the preferences of the client (who's soulmate you need to find).

By chatting to each candidate, you will have to figure out who the soulmate is.

This will train the AI, making the proposed candidates more and more alike the soulmate as you go.

However. beware, sometimes no candidate fits the client's preferences exactly. You must pick the candidate that fits best.

So what are you waiting for? Apply today!
